org.apache.river.test.spec.config.configurationprovider

Class GetInstance_QATest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.spec.config.configurationprovider.GetInstance_QATest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetInstance_ClassLoaderDenyTest, GetInstance_ClassLoaderTest, GetInstance_Test

    public abstract class GetInstance_QATest
extends QATestEnvironment
implements Test
    This class collects together common parts for all getInstance method tests infrastructure.

      • testResource

        protected Exception testResource(String content)
                          throws IOException
        Cofiguring resource and testing actions. Create class directory "jini.test.spec.config" in temporary directory. Create resource META-INF/services/net.jini.config.Configuration with specified "content" in the class directory. Create URLClassLoader that points to class directory. Call ConfigurationProvider.getInstance with some valid option and created class loder. Assert that valid class was returned. Cleanup used temporary directory.
        Parameters:
        content - desired content of resource file
        Returns:
        if ConfigurationException was thrown returns it, null otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException

      • testResource

        protected Exception testResource(String[] options,
                                 String content)
                          throws IOException
        Cofiguring resource and testing actions. Create class directory "jini.test.spec.config" in temporary directory. Create resource META-INF/services/net.jini.config.Configuration with specified content in the class directory. Create URLClassLoader that points to class directory. Call ConfigurationProvider.getInstance with specified options and created class loder. Assert that valid class was returned. Cleanup used temporary directory.
        Parameters:
        options - desired content of options array
        content - desired content of resource file
        Returns:
        if ConfigurationException was thrown returns it, null otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException

      • testResource

        protected Exception testResource(String[] options,
                                 String content,
                                 ClassLoader cl)
                          throws IOException
        Cofiguring resource and testing actions. Call ConfigurationProvider.getInstance with specified options and class loder. Assert that valid class was returned. Cleanup used temporary directory.
        Parameters:
        options - desired content of options array
        content - class name that should be returned
        cl - class loader for using as parameter
        Returns:
        if ConfigurationException was thrown returns it, null otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException
